$Log: server-wan.xml,v $ Revision 1.7 2008/10/18 00:55:46 mjk copyright 5.1
Revision 1.6 2008/07/22 00:34:40 bruno first whack at vlan support
Revision 1.5 2008/03/06 23:41:30 mjk copyright storm on
Revision 1.4 2007/06/23 04:03:18 mjk mars hill copyright
Revision 1.3 2006/01/27 22:29:42 bruno stable (mostly) after integration of new foundation and localization code
Revision 1.2 2005/05/23 23:59:21 fds Frontend Restore
Revision 1.1 2005/03/01 00:22:26 mjk moved to base roll
Revision 1.13 2005/02/15 22:58:52 mjk dtd is gone
Revision 1.12 2004/08/24 23:07:19 bruno timezone cleanup
for bug 6
Revision 1.11 2004/08/20 23:45:26 fds Simpler. Get a new kickstart cert every time.
Revision 1.10 2004/08/18 20:47:47 fds Give nodes a copy of our CA cert so they can verify us in the future.
Revision 1.9 2004/07/26 22:52:48 fds Rocks is done.
Revision 1.8 2004/07/14 23:54:08 fds cluster-cert (for wan installs) correctly saved from anaconda
Revision 1.7 2004/07/12 22:17:24 fds Webserver can now issue new certificates. Trusting Apache.
Revision 1.6 2004/07/12 21:19:28 fds Apache security tweaks
Revision 1.5 2004/07/07 18:42:04 fds Better DN handling (no 64-char limits) using tricks from Dr Stephen Henson. Note external certs do not record an IP address.
Revision 1.4 2004/07/01 00:08:21 fds Security, and new rocks-dist structure.
Revision 1.3 2004/06/29 22:30:57 fds Putting apache conf files in conf.d where they are automatically included.
Revision 1.2 2004/03/25 03:15:44 bruno touch 'em all!
update version numbers to 3.2.0 and update copyrights
Revision 1.1 2004/03/19 03:24:51 bruno updates to support new directory structure for XML files
